#summary Patches to the 'official' helgrind 

Here we list the patches to the official helgrind that are made as a part of this project. 

== Test suite == 
See RacecheckUnittest. 

== Client requests == 
  * `_VG_USERREQ__HG_GET_THREAD_ID` -- to make helgrind debugging more verbose. 
  * `_VG_USERREQ__HG_EXPECT_RACE` -- to support _positive_ unit tests. 
  
  See [http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/helgrind/helgrind.h helgrind.h] for more comments 
  and [http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/helgrind/hg_main.c hg_main.c] for implementation. 

== Dynamic annotations ==
See [http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/unittest/dynamic_annotations.h dynamic_annotations.h] for details. 
Helgrind's part is in [http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/helgrind/hg_annotations.c hg_annotations.c].
